DOC.criteria: Male female individual age 18 40 year old BMI 19 29 kg/m2 Having capacity consent study Under 18 40 Family history psychiatric illness among first degree relative ( parent , sibling , child ) Delirium secondary medical illness Any contraindication MR scan , include claustrophobia , pregnancy , etc . Medical condition might endanger subject blood draw ( e.g . hemophilia ) Significant medical neurological illness Prior high altitude pulmonary edema ( HAPE ) highaltitude cerebral edema ( HACE ) diagnosis Born altitudes great 2,100 ( ~7,000 ft ) Systemic disease without functional limitation ; include control hypertension control diabetes without systemic effect cardiac condition without functional limitation , , coronary artery disease valve disease Pregnancy determine urine pregnancy test , detect presence human chorionic gonadotropin ( hCG ) , less six week postpartum , plan conceive study period . Women willing receive serum pregnancy test Active smoke tobacco chewer . Volunteers may enrol quit smoke 1 year .
